Trump basically said "Oh - I declare war and that it's Venezuelan invading us."  Ignoring that there's no actual war, no fighting with Venezuela, Congress hasn't declared war, on and on and on. Author: Federal_Drummer7105

Comment: I don't see an indication that he's not going to listen to the SCOTUS  based only on what I've seen, not what he said. I understand that is wishful thinking.   Many people will point to his refusal to bring Garcia back as an example of him ignoring orders.  He was not ordered to return Garcia by the Supreme Court. I wish he was. But the Supreme Court took the easy way out and said facilitating, a word that they did not Define that could mean bring him back. It could mean remove all barriers to bring him back. It also could mean don't refuse to take him if the offer is made to return him. I feel this is intentional because you notice how they remain silent while both sides claim they got a 9-0 victory in that ruling.
Author: SoraUsagi
